===Etymology===
Named for the coin's mass, which is 3 [[candareen]]s and 6 [[cash]] (1.37 g). In a common secret code ({{lang|zh|之辰代碼}}) that was used by merchants in Guangzhou and Hong Kong, 3 is {{zh-l|*斗}} and 6 is {{zh-l|*零}}.
